attributes.action: Inform the government of Iran that we the British people find Iran’s rationale, actions & behaviour in this crisis to be unacceptable & intolerable. That we the British people therefore demand the immediate, safe & unconditional return of the 15 UK service personnel they currently have within their custody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simply a petition to show to the government of Iran the anger & disgust of the British of people, over the detention & treatment of our forces personnel being held captive there, with a view of seeing them home safe & back soonest with their families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
